name: Common Cold
description: A viral infection of the upper respiratory tract
see_doctor: If symptoms persist more than 10 days or worsen significantly

name: Influenza (Flu)
description: A viral infection that attacks the respiratory system
see_doctor: For severe symptoms difficulty breathing or if high-risk individual

name: Migraine Headache
description: A type of headache characterized by severe throbbing pain
recommendations: ['Rest in dark quiet room', 'Apply cold compress', 'Stay hydrated', 'Prescription medications']
see_doctor: For frequent migraines or severe symptoms that interfere with daily life

name: Gastritis
see_doctor: For persistent pain blood in vomit or severe symptoms

name: Food Poisoning
description: Illness caused by eating contaminated food
see_doctor: For severe dehydration high fever or blood in stool

name: Tension Headache
description: Most common type of headache caused by muscle tension
recommendations: ['Rest', 'Apply heat or cold', 'Over-the-counter pain relievers', 'Stress management']
see_doctor: If headaches become frequent or severe

name: Anxiety Disorder
description: Excessive worry or fear that interferes with daily activities
see_doctor: If anxiety interferes with daily life or causes panic attacks

name: Allergic Reaction
see_doctor: For severe reactions difficulty breathing or swelling
